title: @ScaleVolume
description: A tool to scale the volume of datasets

val_clip.title: Value Clip
val_clip.description: Min and Max of output dataset. Default V0 = 0 and V1 = 255

perc_clip.title: Percentile Clip
perc_clip.description: Set lowest P0 percentile to Min and highest P1 percentile to Max. Default P0 = 2 and P1 = 98

scale_by_mean.title: Scale by Mean
scale_by_mean.description: Divide each sub-brick by mean of non-zero voxels

scale_by_median.title: Scale by Median
scale_by_median.description: Divide each sub-brick by median of non-zero voxels

norm.title: Normalize
norm.description: For each time series T, Tnorm = (T - mean(T)) / stdev(T)

mask.title: Mask
mask.description: Restrict to non-zero values of given mask dataset
